db:select.doc:name: Retrive Indigo Flight Data
db:select.db:sql: SELECT * FROM T_INDIGO WHERE C_ORIGIN = :Source AND C_DESTINATION = :Destination AND C_DEPARTURE_DATE BETWEEN CONCAT(:Date, " ", "00:00:00") AND CONCAT(:Date, " ", "23:59:59");

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { indigoFlights: payload map { airline: $.C_AIRLINE, flightCode: $.C_FLIGHT_CODE, price: $.C_PRICE as Number as String {format: "#,###"}, departureDate: $.C_DEPARTURE_DATE as LocalDateTime {format : "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss"} as DateTime {format : "yyyy-MM-dd"}, arrivalDate: $.C_ARRIVAL_DATE as LocalDateTime {format : "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss"} as DateTime {format : "yyyy-MM-dd"}, sourceAirportCode: $.C_ORIGIN_AIRPORT_CODE, destinationAirportCode: $.C_DESTINATION_AIRPORT_CODE, source: $.C_ORIGIN, destination: $.C_DESTINATION, emptySeats: $.C_EMPTY_SEATS, planeType: $.C_PLANE_TYPE, totalSeats: $.C_TOTAL_SEATS } }
%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { status: "Failure", message: "No flight available for incoming request." }
